summary: The implementation covers all core requirements including authentication, TRC20 withdrawals, mining interface, admin panel, Telegram integration, and professional landing page. All requested features appear to be implemented based on the file diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: User approval system requiring admin approval before users can access the platform
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention any user approval or admin approval workflow. Users should be able to create accounts and access the system immediately after authentication per REQ-1. The implementation adds an approval gate where users must wait for admin approval after account creation.

hallucinated_features.description: Role-based access control system with assignRole functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only specifies admin panel functionality for withdrawal approval (REQ-4). No requirement mentions role assignment, role management, or complex access control beyond admin vs regular user distinction.
